original_definition: 'over-the-counter' means any transaction carried out outside an organised market;
generated_definition: 'over-the-counter' means a financial transaction that takes place directly between two parties, typically without the involvement of an intermediary such as a broker or bank.

Article 2: ‘over-the-counter’ (OTC) means any transaction carried out outside an organised market;
‘over-the-counter’ (OTC) means any transaction carried out outside anorganised market;
